subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The heavy favorite Discreetly Mine took control from Essence Hit Man drew away to an eight-and-three-quarter-length victory in the Amsterdam Stakes for 3-year-olds at Saratoga Race Course.
snippet: The heavy favorite Discreetly Mine took control from Essence Hit Man drew away to an eight-and-three-quarter-length victory in the Amsterdam Stakes for 3-year-olds at Saratoga Race Course.
